snippet.title: Let's Make a Soccer Team! [Playstation 2] Overview Part 1
snippet.description:
Run through the menus in-game, note that not all options are available since this stil the beginning of the 1st season.

LMAST! (Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! Euro Championship in Japan) is a Sega's attempt to make a console-style football manager, it uses the same 3D game engine as VPF (which isn't that great). AFAIK this is the first, and so far the only, english release of a game from "Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! " series that was born in the Sega Saturn days.

Add "&fmt=18" to url for smoother framerate.
